resources.string:
More About JumpStartâ€¦
JumpStart is a mobile vehicle expert app that is build for you to be able to do the following tasks:
1.JumpStart will help you locate the nearest garage easily from your vehicle fault site. 2.JumpStart will help you on how to fix your car. 3.JumpStart will not only guide you but also educate you some of the simple vehicle fixing solutions, 4.JumpStart will also help you easily diagnose complex faults and repair.
Try it Out
